definitions: denoting or concerned with investigation; investigative

examples.text: students are encouraged to adopt an active, investigational approach to their learning
public criticism grew as their investigational tactics grew more aggressive

definitions: denoting or relating to a drug or medical procedure that is not approved for general use but is under investigation in clinical trials with respect to its safety and efficacy

examples.text: the focus of this research is an investigational vaccine
an initiative designed to accelerate the evaluation of new investigational therapies for multiple myeloma

shortDefinitions: denoting drug or procedure under investigation in clinical trials
